title: Driving Under Influence
description: Do not drive under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
detailedDescription: Driving while intoxicated impairs judgment, reaction times, and coordination, significantly increasing the risk of accidents. It is not only dangerous but also illegal in most jurisdictions.

title: Speeding
description: Do not exceed the posted speed limit.
detailedDescription: Speeding reduces the driver's reaction time and increases the stopping distance, making accidents more likely and severe.

title: Running a Red Light
description: Always stop at red traffic signals.
detailedDescription: Ignoring red lights can lead to dangerous collisions at intersections, risking lives and property.

title: Illegal Parking
description: Do not park in restricted or prohibited areas.
detailedDescription: Illegal parking can block traffic, create hazards, and result in fines or towing.

title: Failure to Yield
description: Always yield the right of way when required.
detailedDescription: Failing to yield can lead to accidents, especially at intersections or when merging.

title: Using a Mobile Phone While Driving
description: Avoid using mobile phones while driving.
detailedDescription: Using a mobile phone distracts drivers, increasing the risk of accidents and endangering others.

title: Driving Without Seatbelt
description: Always wear your seatbelt while driving.
detailedDescription: Seatbelts significantly reduce the risk of injury or death in the event of a collision.

title: Driving Without License
description: Do not operate a vehicle without a valid license.
detailedDescription: A license ensures that the driver is trained and authorized to operate a vehicle safely.

title: Tailgating
description: Maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead.
detailedDescription: Tailgating reduces reaction time and increases the risk of rear-end collisions.

title: Overloading Vehicle
description: Do not exceed the passenger or cargo limit of your vehicle.
detailedDescription: Overloading can impair vehicle handling and braking, increasing accident risks.

title: Improper Lane Usage
description: Stay in your designated lane while driving.
detailedDescription: Improper lane usage can confuse other drivers and lead to collisions.

title: Driving With Obstructed View
description: Do not block your windshield or windows with items.
detailedDescription: Obstructed views make it difficult to spot hazards and increase accident risk.

title: Failure to Signal
description: Always use indicators when turning or changing lanes.
detailedDescription: Failure to signal can lead to confusion and accidents.

title: Driving Without Insurance
description: Do not operate a vehicle without valid insurance.
detailedDescription: Insurance is essential to cover damages in case of accidents.

title: Illegal U-turn
description: Do not make U-turns where prohibited.
detailedDescription: Illegal U-turns disrupt traffic flow and increase the risk of collisions.

title: Failure to Stop for Pedestrians
description: Stop for pedestrians at crosswalks.
detailedDescription: Ignoring pedestrian right of way endangers lives and violates traffic rules.

title: Driving With Expired License
description: Renew your license before it expires.
detailedDescription: Driving with an expired license is against the law and may result in penalties.

title: Driving Without Lights at Night
description: Always use headlights in low-visibility conditions.
detailedDescription: Driving without lights at night reduces visibility and increases accident risk.

title: Running a Stop Sign
description: Come to a complete stop at stop signs.
detailedDescription: Running stop signs increases the risk of intersection collisions.

title: Blocking an Intersection
description: Do not stop your vehicle in the middle of an intersection.
detailedDescription: Blocking intersections disrupts traffic and creates hazards for other drivers.

title: Driving in a Bike Lane
description: Stay out of lanes designated for bicycles.
detailedDescription: Driving in bike lanes endangers cyclists and violates traffic laws.

title: Driving Without Mirrors
description: Ensure your vehicle has functional mirrors.
detailedDescription: Mirrors are critical for safe lane changes and situational awareness.

title: Overtaking on the Wrong Side
description: Only overtake from the correct side.
detailedDescription: Overtaking improperly can result in head-on collisions or force others off the road.

title: Failure to Stop for School Bus
description: Stop when a school bus is picking up or dropping off children.
detailedDescription: Failing to stop for school buses endangers children and is a serious violation.

title: Improper Turns
description: Follow traffic rules for making turns.
detailedDescription: Improper turns can lead to accidents and disrupt traffic flow.

title: Reckless Driving
description: Do not drive with disregard for safety.
detailedDescription: Reckless driving endangers all road users and often leads to severe consequences.

title: Driving Without Registration
description: Ensure your vehicle is properly registered.
detailedDescription: Unregistered vehicles are illegal to operate on public roads.

title: Driving With Faulty Brakes
description: Maintain your vehicle’s brakes in proper working condition.
detailedDescription: Faulty brakes increase stopping distances and the risk of collisions.

title: Driving Underage
description: Do not drive if you are below the legal driving age.
detailedDescription: Underage drivers lack the necessary training and experience to operate vehicles safely.

title: Failing to Obey Traffic Signs
description: Follow all posted traffic signs.
detailedDescription: Ignoring traffic signs can lead to confusion and accidents.

title: Driving on Sidewalks
description: Do not drive on sidewalks.
detailedDescription: Sidewalks are designated for pedestrians, and driving on them is dangerous and illegal.

title: Illegal Racing
description: Do not participate in unauthorized street racing.
detailedDescription: Illegal racing endangers participants and bystanders alike.

title: Driving in Reverse on Highways
description: Never drive in reverse on a highway.
detailedDescription: Reversing on highways can confuse other drivers and lead to severe accidents.

title: Failing to Dim High Beams
description: Dim high beams for oncoming traffic at night.
detailedDescription: Failure to dim high beams can blind other drivers and increase accident risks.

title: Crossing Double Yellow Lines
description: Do not cross double yellow lines to overtake.
detailedDescription: Crossing double yellow lines is unsafe and typically prohibited.

title: Driving Too Slowly in Fast Lanes
description: Keep to the right if driving below the speed limit.
detailedDescription: Driving too slowly in fast lanes disrupts traffic and increases accident risks.

title: Not Securing Loads Properly
description: Ensure cargo is secured before driving.
detailedDescription: Improperly secured loads can fall and cause accidents.

title: Driving While Drowsy
description: Avoid driving when feeling fatigued.
detailedDescription: Drowsy driving impairs judgment and reaction times, increasing accident risks.

title: Improper Use of Horn
description: Do not use the horn unnecessarily.
detailedDescription: Excessive honking causes noise pollution and can distract other drivers.

title: Driving on Restricted Roads
description: Follow restrictions for certain roads or zones.
detailedDescription: Driving on restricted roads can disrupt traffic and lead to penalties.

title: Using Emergency Lanes Improperly
description: Only use emergency lanes for emergencies.
detailedDescription: Improper use of emergency lanes obstructs access for emergency vehicles.

title: Driving Without a Helmet
description: Always wear a helmet when riding a two-wheeler.
detailedDescription: Helmets protect riders from severe head injuries in accidents.

title: Driving With Overly Tinted Windows
description: Avoid excessive tinting on vehicle windows.
detailedDescription: Overly tinted windows reduce visibility and violate legal regulations.

title: Failing to Check Blind Spots
description: Check blind spots before lane changes or turns.
detailedDescription: Neglecting blind spots can result in collisions with unseen vehicles.

title: Driving Without Proper Child Restraints
description: Ensure children are secured in appropriate car seats.
detailedDescription: Proper child restraints reduce the risk of injury during accidents.

title: Driving on the Shoulder
description: Avoid using the shoulder to overtake or bypass traffic.
detailedDescription: Driving on the shoulder endangers stopped vehicles and pedestrians.

title: Improper Vehicle Maintenance
description: Regularly service and maintain your vehicle.
detailedDescription: Neglected maintenance increases the likelihood of mechanical failures on the road.
